doc.title: OSA: Sisters in Science
doc.plot: OSA: Sisters in Science is the story of young women from a South Side Chicago high school, empowered through education in the emerging science of Onco-fertility. The documentary follows these students and their families as they explore opportunities in the fields of science and medicine. They intrepidly take on challenging experiments and difficult questions in a professional research laboratory. Sparked by scientific curiosity and inspired by the doctors and researchers with whom they work, these young women emerge with confidence as future leaders in science and medicine and beyond.
